EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-08-16-Q3 Partner Town Hall Meeting.EMAIL-Invite #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Town Hall Meeting Next Week - Register Today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, As a valued partner, we would like to invite you to join us on our upcoming Partner Town Hall Meeting. <[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-q3-partner-town-hall-meeting?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=q3-partner-town-hall&utm_content=08102016]]> This live webinar is taking place on Tuesday, August 16th at 11:00 AM EDT.
Join us <[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-q3-partner-town-hall-meeting?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=q3-partner-town-hall&utm_content=08102016]]> in this opportunity to connect with partners and look at our top initiatives for Q3 as they pertain to the channel. This Partner Town Hall Meeting is especially important since we will discussing and answering questions regarding the VMTurbo rebranding initiative. Additionally, we will be discussing the following:
- VMTurbo Momentum - Partner Download Links
- Upcoming Field Events
- Promotions in Progress - Q & A
This webinar will be approximately 45 minutes and will have a 15 minute Q & A session to voice any questions, concerns, and feedback. Click here <[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-q3-partner-town-hall-meeting?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=q3-partner-town-hall&utm_content=08102016]]> to join us on August 16th at 11:00 AM EDT. Look forward to seeing you on the call,
Sean Finnegan Vice President of Channel Sales
